p: Three oils were prepared using olive: sesame: flaxseed in ratios of 65:30:5, 60:30:10 and 55:30:15 in triplicate. The oil mixtures were stored at 4 and 24°C for 90 days. Experiments were carried out on the production day and every 30 days. The fatty acid profile was determined on the first and 90th days.
